long_description: The popular Hang Two Carrier is upgraded with factory rack compatibility and improved board protection. This carrier for Thule racks can secure up to 2 surfboards for travel by automobile. Maximum board protection and lateral transport stability with soft, oversized cradle. Two board capacity out of the box (you no longer need surf strap to transport second board). Universal mounting design adapts easily to Thule square and Xsporter load bars, round and most factory installed racks. Strong, easy-to-use padded straps provide board protection and transport security.
short_description: The popular Hang Two Carrier is upgraded with factory rack compatibility and improved board protection.
